extension.name: OLSLive
extension.author: www.Canadatopit.com
extension.description: A custom design for Oracle Legal Services

field.name: tmplMainColor
field.label: Template Logo and decoration background color
field.description: Main color used for top decoration elements as their background and the logo, originally defaults to a bluish color.

field.name: bodyColor
field.label: body Text Color
field.description: This color is used generally for all places, except for those having own special color defined

field.name: dominantTextcolor
field.label: Decoration text: Carousel-top, etc.
field.description: Appears in carousel / slider and the testimonials area.

field.name: socialIconHoverColor
field.label: Social Icons Hover Color
field.description: This color is used for the social icons hover state and default to a dark gray.

field.name: caretColor
field.label: Caret - Navigation Indicator
field.description: This color is used at the end of the menu items that contain sub-menus, as a small sign, defaults to red.

field.name: topNavScreenWideBgColor
field.label: Navigation Full Background Color
field.description: The screen-wide top navigation background color.

field.name: topNavStaticColor
field.label: Top Navigation Elements' Color
field.description: The screen-wide top navigation background color.

field.name: topNavStaticBgColor
field.label: Top Navigation Elements' Background Color
field.description: The screen-wide top navigation background color.

field.name: mobNavColor
field.label: Mobile Navigation Top Botton Title Color
field.description: Changes title of botton of mobile top-most navigation

field.name: mobNavRootButtonHoverFocusActiveBgColor
field.label: Hover and Focus and Active Background
field.description: Hover and Focus and Active Background

field.name: mobNavRootButtonHoverFocusActiveBorderColor
field.label: Hover and Focus and Active Border
field.description: Hover and Focus and Active Border

field.name: carouselReadMoreBgColor
field.label: Carousel Read More Botton Background Color
field.description: For the 'read more' botton of the slider, at top of the template

field.name: carouselReadMoreColor
field.label: Carousel Read More Botton Color
field.description: For the 'read more' botton of the slider, at top of the template

field.name: carouselReadMoreHoverColor
field.label: Carousel Read More Botton Hover Color
field.description: For the 'read more' botton of the slider, at top of the template

field.name: carouselReadMoreHoverBgColor
field.label: Carousel Read More Botton Hover Background Color
field.description: For the 'read more' botton of the slider, at top of the template

field.name: breadcrumbsActiveLinkColor
field.label: Breadcrumbs Active Link Color
field.description: Used for active links of the breadcrumbs. Defaults to a bluish color.

field.name: breadcrumbsNonActiveLinkColor
field.label: Breadcrumbs Non Active Link Color
field.description: Used for non-active links of the breadcrumbs. Defaults to a grayish color.

field.name: welcomeSectionColor
field.label: Intro (Welcome) Section Color
field.description: Used in Intro (Welcome) Section. Defaults to a very dark gray.

field.name: srvLinkBtnColor
field.label: Service Link Botton Text Color
field.description: Used in service sections for color of text inside bottons. Defaults to a very dark blue.

field.name: srvLinkBtnHoverColor
field.label: Service Link Botton Text Color, Hover
field.description: Hover state color of the service botton.

field.name: srvLinkBtnHoverBgColor
field.label: Service Link Botton Background Color, Hover
field.description: Hover state background color of the service botton.

field.name: srvLinkColor
field.label: Service Link Color
field.description: Used in service sections for links. Defaults to a very dark blue.

field.name: srvLinkHoverColor
field.label: Service Link Hover Color
field.description: Used in service sections for links. Defaults to a very dark blue.

field.name: footerBgColor
field.label: Footer Background Color
field.description: Used in the footer background. Defaults to a not-totally black.

field.name: footerLinkTextcolor
field.label: Footer Links Color
field.description: Used in colors of links that appear in the footer area.

field.name: footerLinkIndicatorcolor
field.label: Footer Links-Indicator Color
field.description: This color can be optionally used to decorate an indicator sign for the footer links.

field.name: footerLinkTextHovercolor
field.label: Footer Links Hover Color
field.description: Used in colors of links in hover state of the footer area.

field.name: footerH3Color
field.label: Footer H3 Color
field.description: Header color used in the footer area for h3 markup tag

field.name: footerCopyrightTextColor
field.label: Footer Copyright Text Color
field.description: Used in footer area for the copyrgiht text.

field.name: footerCopyrightBgColor
field.label: Footer Copyright Background Color
field.description: Used in footer area for the copyrgiht text background.

field.name: rColorIntegerA
field.label: Type A - Red
field.description: Used to form an RGB color (3-components color) used for borders, slide-content background, etc. This is the red-component of the RGB-color.

field.name: gColorIntegerA
field.label: Type A - Green
field.description: Used to form an RGB color (3-components color) used for borders, slide-content background, etc. This is the green-component of the RGB-color.

field.name: bColorIntegerA
field.label: Type A - Blue
field.description: Used to form an RGB color (3-components color) used for borders, slide-content background, etc. This is the blue-component of the RGB-color.

field.name: rColorIntegerB
field.label: Type B - Red
field.description: Used to form an RGB color (3-components color) used for borders, slide-content background, etc. This is the red-component of the RGB-color.

field.name: gColorIntegerB
field.label: Type B - Green
field.description: Used to form an RGB color (3-components color) used for borders, slide-content background, etc. This is the green-component of the RGB-color.

field.name: bColorIntegerB
field.label: Type B - Blue
field.description: Used to form an RGB color (3-components color) used for borders, slide-content background, etc. This is the blue-component of the RGB-color.

field.name: rColorIntegerC
field.label: Type C - Red
field.description: RGB effecting on slider bottons, etc.

field.name: gColorIntegerC
field.label: Type C - Green
field.description: RGB effecting on slider bottons, etc.

field.name: bColorIntegerC
field.label: Type C - Blue
field.description: RGB effecting on slider bottons, etc.

field.name: opacity3
field.label: default was 0.3
field.description: Related to type A of RGB color settings. Used for the search input box border, carousel header and slide content background color, service area header botton border and testimonial caption background color.

field.name: opacity4
field.label: default was 0.4
field.description: Defines opacity of carousel content and header, and the testimonial header backgrounds.

field.name: opacity5
field.label: Slider bottons: default 0.5
field.description: Carousel and testimonials slider bottons opacity are set by this variable.

field.name: opacity6
field.label: default was 0.6
field.description: Carousel top head background opacity where advertisements could be placed.

field.name: opacity7
field.label: Top Navigation Opacity.
field.description: used in style of the design, mostly for borders. The default was 0.95

field.name: logoFile
field.label: Logo file
field.description: You can upload a logo file here to change the main site logo.

field.name: canadaLeafImage
field.label: Canada Leaf Image
field.description: This image is used as a part of logo in the font version of the log.

field.name: advMsgPA
field.default: Free Consultation Now
field.label: Advertisement Message - left part
field.description: This message together with B part will be shown in the site slide-show header area, also in mobile page header

field.name: advMsgPB
field.label: Advertisement Message - right part
field.description: This message together with A part will be shown in the site slide-show header area, also in mobile page header

field.name: cycleSliderTimeout
field.label: Carousel slide show time (in seconds)
field.description: Zero means manually sliding, greater than zero counts for slide show time

field.name: slide1h1
field.default: Small Claims Court
field.label: Slide-1 Header

field.name: slide1p
field.default: If you receive a Statement of Claim from small claims court, it means someone is suing you for the reasons stated on the forms.
field.label: Slide-1 description

field.name: slide2h1
field.default: Debt Recovery
field.label: Slide-2 Header

field.name: slide2p
field.default: We are licensed paralegals and provide court representation in Small Claims Court and Specialize in debt recovery and collections.
field.label: Slide-2 description

field.name: slide3h1
field.default: Jurisdiction of the Small Claims Court
field.label: Slide-3 Header

field.name: slide3p
field.default: The Small Claims Court can handle any action for the payment of money or the recovery of possession of personal property where...
field.label: Slide-3 description

field.name: slide4h1
field.default: Debt Recovery
field.label: Slide-4 Header

field.name: slide4p
field.default: If you receive a Statement of Claim from small claims court, it means someone is suing you for the reasons stated on the forms.
field.label: Slide-4 description

field.name: slide5h1
field.default: Small Claims Court
field.label: Slide-5 Header

field.name: slide5p
field.default: We are licensed paralegals and provide court representation in Small Claims Court and Specialize in debt recovery and collections.
field.label: Slide-5 description

field.name: slide6h1
field.default: Jurisdiction of the Small Claims Court
field.label: Slide-6 Header

field.name: slide6p
field.default: The Small Claims Court can handle any action for the payment of money or the recovery of possession of personal property where...
field.label: Slide-6 description

field.name: introTitle
field.default: Welcome to OLS
field.label: Header

field.name: introContent
field.default: Oracle Legal Services is a paralegal professional company . We provide the highest quality and variety of legal services. We offer extensive expertise in small claim courts matters, traffic ticket matters, landlord and tenant matters, and much more.
field.label: Message

field.name: testimonialsCycleSliderTimeout
field.label: Testimonials' slide show time (in seconds)
field.description: Zero means manually sliding, greater than zero counts for slide show time

field.name: writer1
field.default: Trevor Comeau
field.label: Testimonial-1 Writer

field.name: story1
field.default: I write to express my thanks to Mr. Rezabeik; I went to Oracle Legal Services for a breach of contract against a corporation. Mr Rezabeik submitted my claim to small claims court. I was shocked to see how quickly my case was settled. I was very impressed with the professionalism and approach to the situation. Excellent job!
field.label: Testimonial-1 text

field.name: writer2
field.default: Joseph Hanti
field.label: Testimonial-2 Writer

field.name: story2
field.default: I was referred to 'Oracle Legal Services' by a friend of mine for a debt recovery claim in Small Claims Court. I would recommend Oracle Legal Services to anyone who wants reliable and trustworthy legal advice. They're prompt, professional and they know the law.
field.label: Testimonial-2 text

field.name: writer3
field.default: Maryam M.
field.label: Testimonial-3 Writer

field.name: story3
field.default: I would like to thank Mr. Rezabeik for an exceptional job in Landlord and Tenant Board. I am a landlord, and my tenant submitted an application to the landlord and tenant board for all kinds of damages. Mr.Rezabeik dismissed the case. Grate Job!
field.label: Testimonial-3 text

field.name: writer4
field.default: Behrouz Javadi
field.label: Testimonial-4 Writer

field.name: story4
field.default: I called Oracle Leal Services for a Commercial Tenancy matter; I was very pleased to have Mr. Rezabeik represented my case, and I got a very good settlement in Settlement Conference at Small Claims Court. I would recommend his services and professionalism to others, and I will sure use his services in future.
field.label: Testimonial-4 text

field.name: footerCopyrightText
field.label: Optional copyright text
field.description: Copyright text that appear in the footer area.
